CIPHER.0.cipherString: Reality only reveals itself when it is illuminated by a ray of poetry.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: You have to go on and be crazy. Craziness is like heaven.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword rolled.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: I'm an idealist. I don't know where I'm going, but I'm on my way.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword mutual.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: It is necessary that I am viewed as a product. I am a product.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword break.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I know well what I am fleeing from but not what I am in search of.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword morocco.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword fatal.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine.
CIPHER.6.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword fraction.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: I might have to take the 12 steps to Workaholics Anonymous.
CIPHER.7.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword finish.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Domestic inflation reflects domestic monetary policy.
CIPHER.8.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword trustees.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: Remember, either you control your money or it will control you.
CIPHER.9.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword injured.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I don't get paid what people think I get paid for fighting.
CIPHER.10.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword slots.
